content: As an atheist, this pricks me (even more than the entry about prayer). While I can understand “praying” (I meditate and incorporate some declarations about my day/intentions), having faith is a tough phrase to accept. I think there is something here though. It makes a statement about what I can do, what dreams I can accomplish. Without faith, my goals are just wishes with plans, but not backed by confidence. If nothing else, I need to have faith in myself and the validity of my dreams.
